text:
Hey, hey, Producer!
Do you have anything brown by any chance...!?

Brown thing?
What's up, why are you so flustered?

Meguru's fortune today isn't looking good, so I wanted
to at least grab a lucky item, something brown.

Oh, is that it?
Well... let me see...

Just about to have some coffee.
How about mixing it with milk to create a lucky color?

That sounds good!
Then, let's all have tea together!

My handkerchief today happens to be brown.
I haven't used it yet, though...

Thank you for your consideration.
Um, would it be okay if I borrowed it for the day?

Hehe, indeed, Saturday is brown, isn't it? Then, in exchange
for getting some power, I'll bring you some water!
